## model.deleteInput(input, line)



Delete line from specified input

@status current Introduced in 2.0.0


#### Parameters

* `input` (unsigned number) input number (use 0 for Input1)

* `line`  (unsigned number) input line (use 0 for first line)



#### Return value

none
